bill.title: Employment First Act; require state agencies to give priority to persons with disabilities.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "employment First Act"; To Require That State Agencies That Provide Services And Support To Persons With Disabilities Shall Consider, As Their First Option, Competitive Employment In An Integrated Setting For Persons With Disabilities; To Require All State Agencies To Follow This Policy For Employment By Coordinating All Collaborating Efforts Among Agencies; To Authorize State Agencies To Adopt Rules And Regulations To Implement The Act; To Establish An Employment First Oversight Commission Which Shall Review Measurable Goals And Objectives As Submitted To It By Each Relevant State Agency To Ensure Implementation Of The Act; To Provide Reporting Requirements; And For Related Purposes.
